maha amathi warayage mema patu deshapalana wuwamanawa wenuwen rajya niladharin lesa uuwa palath adhyapana lekamwariya, palath adhyapana adhyaksha ha kalapa adhyapana adhyaksha mema widuhalpathiniyata me sa`daha balapam kirimath, ethanin nonawathi ee sadaha maha amathiwarayage nila niwasa wetha raugena yamath, ehidi maha amathiwaraya wisin mema widuhalpathiniyata ella kala pidawa ha pasuwa ema siddhiya yatapath kirimata sidukala balapama mehi mulika wimarshanayata lak wiya yuthu karunu we.

ayage pitupasin pamini wan rathayaka siti kanthawan thidenaku wisin balahathkarawa aya wahanayata ada dama gena athi athara ema wahanaye siti riyadura ayata pistholayak penwa biya ganwa ayage as banda paharagena thibe.me siddhiyata goduruwu kanthawa kolambaa pradeshaye kamarayaka dina dekak sirakara thaba ganimen pasu ayata athiwu rogabadhayak nisa thriwil rathayakin prathikara labadimata yana awasthawe aya thriwilayen pana wahanayaka nagi pasugiya 05 wana dina kotuwa polisiyata gos paminillak idiripath kara atha.mita wasara 06kata pera miya yana ladayi kiyana kanthawakda siddiyata sambandhawi athi bawata thorathuru anawaranayawi atha.me kanthawa ema pradeshaye padinchi biriya miya gos siti pirimiyaku samaga aniyam sambandhayak pawathwamin sita atha.

lamayi mati saha mitar wima gana onna ehenan ada kiyandayi yanne.me gana mage mathayak thiyenawa.eeka ithin waradi wenda puluwan.kamak na onnohe kiyannanko.samahara lamayi punchi kale indala anith lamayinta wada buddhimath thamayi.habayi eeken kiyawenne na anith ewun mati kiyala.mokada minis molaya kiyanne maha puduma upakaranayak ne.mekath nikan kimbaula udalla wage thamayi.kapanda kapanda thamayi muwahath wenne.ape molaya api hariyakata wadak gannathuwa thibboth eeka nikan malakada kapu parana loriyak wage wenawa.oone welawata thallu karala start karagena hemihita paddi paddi thamayi wada karanne.
